top_stories.title: Peak XV raises $1.3B, doubles down on AI as global VC rivalry in India heats up
top_stories.description: Peak XV says most of its new capital will target India as the firm prioritizes AI, fintech and cross-border bets while navigating recent partner departures.
top_stories.author: Jagmeet Singh
top_stories.content: Peak XV says most of its new capital will target India as the firm prioritizes AI, fintech and cross-border bets while navigating recent partner departures.

top_stories.title: Evaluating AI agents: Real-world lessons from building agentic systems at Amazon
top_stories.description: In this post, we present a comprehensive evaluation framework for Amazon agentic AI systems that addresses the complexity of agentic AI applications at Amazon through two core components: a generic evaluation workflow that standardizes assessment procedures across diverse agent implementations, and an agent evaluation library that provides systematic measurements and metrics in Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Evaluations, along with Amazon use case-specific evaluation approaches and metrics.
top_stories.author: Yunfei Bai
top_stories.content: In this post, we present a comprehensive evaluation framework for Amazon agentic AI systems that addresses the complexity of agentic AI applications at Amazon through two core components: a generic evaluation workflow that standardizes assessment procedures across diverse agent implementations, and an agent evaluation library that provides systematic measurements and metrics in Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Evaluations, along with Amazon use case-specific evaluation approaches and metrics.

top_stories.title: NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B MoE model is now available in Amazon SageMaker JumpStart
top_stories.description: Today we’re excited to announce that the NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B model with 3B active parameters is now generally available in the Amazon SageMaker JumpStart model catalog. You can accelerate innovation and deliver tangible business value with Nemotron 3 Nano on Amazon Web Services (AWS) without having to manage model deployment complexities. You can power your generative AI applications with Nemotron capabilities using the managed deployment capabilities offered by SageMaker JumpStart.
top_stories.author: Dan Ferguson
top_stories.content: Today we’re excited to announce that the NVIDIA Nemotron 3 Nano 30B model with 3B active parameters is now generally available in the Amazon SageMaker JumpStart model catalog. You can accelerate innovation and deliver tangible business value with Nemotron 3 Nano on Amazon Web Services (AWS) without having to manage model deployment complexities. You can power your generative AI applications with Nemotron capabilities using the managed deployment capabilities offered by SageMaker JumpStart.

top_stories.title: Building real-time voice assistants with Amazon Nova Sonic compared to cascading architectures
top_stories.description: Amazon Nova Sonic delivers real-time, human-like voice conversations through the bidirectional streaming interface. In this post, you learn how Amazon Nova Sonic can solve some of the challenges faced by cascaded approaches, simplify building voice AI agents, and provide natural conversational capabilities. We also provide guidance on when to choose each approach to help you make informed decisions for your voice AI projects.
top_stories.author: Daniel Wirjo
top_stories.content: Amazon Nova Sonic delivers real-time, human-like voice conversations through the bidirectional streaming interface. In this post, you learn how Amazon Nova Sonic can solve some of the challenges faced by cascaded approaches, simplify building voice AI agents, and provide natural conversational capabilities. We also provide guidance on when to choose each approach to help you make informed decisions for your voice AI projects.

top_stories.title: NIH scientists develop "digital twin" of eye cells to understand and treat age-related macular degeneration
top_stories.description: Breakthrough modeling technology reveals how cells lose their organization in leading cause of vision loss.
top_stories.content: Breakthrough modeling technology reveals how cells lose their organization in leading cause of vision loss.
